text:
e="preserve">Timothy Sean Mulherin (24 August 1957 – 7 September 2020) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the Labor Party. He was the MP for Mackay in the Legislative Assembly of Queensland from 1995 to 2015. He also served as Deputy Leader of the Opposition from 2012 to 2015.
Mulherin was born in Mackay. He was married and had three children. He died of cancer on 7 September 2020 at the age of 63.
